item.title: neve
Home
item.content:encoded:
High-Quality care for pets

Our friendly and experienced staff welcomes you! Contact us

Welcome to Neve Vet Center

You will find physicians, assistants and compassionate staff enthusiastic and committed to our common goal: to provide a top quality veterinary service

General care

We recommend doing routine checkups yearly to make sure your pet is healthy.

Surgery & recovery

Always ready to intervene surgically and save your pet from a critical situation.

Grooming​

Trimming is necessary throughout the year. We provide fur clipping services for your pet.

Why should you choose us?

We know how much the cute furry new member of the family means to you. We know he is a full member and a friend of hope. 01

24/7 Support

We are there whenever you have a companion in a critical situation at any time, day or night, weekend or legal holiday. 02

Top equipment​

Our equipment is amazing, and for a good reason. Your pet deserves treatment with the best tools & procedures.​ 03​

Professional staff​

We value our staff and invest time & resources so that they can learn new procedures and use them to treat your pets.​ 04

Pet sitting​

Stuck in traffic and you need to pick up your pet later? We look after your pet until you can arrive to pick it up.​ Contact us

Happy Clients

They testify our dedication to treating pets with the utmost love, care and professionalism. "I did not think there was anyone who could treat animals just out of passion and love and not make a business out of it! Without their care Max would not have been with us today to play ball in the park and run around." John Spencer Max's owner "On a late night in November around 1AM when Sprinkels was just a tiny cat he had a hypoglycemic crisis... in just two days everything went back to normal due to the doctors' professionalism, good care and treatment." Melissa Dawson​ Sprinkels' owner ​

Business Hours

Monday - Friday 09:00 AM - 05:00 PM Saturday - Sunday 11:00 AM - 02:00 PM

Contact Info​

  • 401 North Maple Drive, Beverly Hills
  • +40 555 321 123
  • pets@nevevetcenter.com

Get In Touch​

Connect with us on social media: Facebook Twitter Instagram Youtube
